summary: This is a Na\\\'vi companion Mod. It is the old Neytiri companion mod from Den987 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19213) but i edited it a bit.
descriptionHtml:
Neytiri can be found in the Bannered Mare. Use either both or just one file because i don\\\'t know which is the right one.

Requires : Apachii Sky Hair

To-do list:

- Learn to make armors and clothes
- Add new Na\\\'\\\'vi race

  -make Tail + Animation
  -build Na\\\'vi village
  -Add Na\\\'vi language

- maybe a Bungee (bird things) to fly
- new skin

p.s. : i need more ideas for the mod and help
author: Seenuan
